meanings.definition: A chemical compound found in certain essential oils.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the irone in the essential oils.
meanings.sent2: The irone gave the essential oils a pleasant scent.
meanings.sent3: The irone in the oils made the room smell like a garden.
meanings.sent4: The irone acted like a magical potion in the essential oils.
meanings.sent5: The irone was the secret ingredient that made the oils so fragrant.

meanings.definition: To use irony in speech or writing.
meanings.sent1: She would often irone her words to make a point.
meanings.sent2: He irones his jokes to make them more interesting.
meanings.sent3: They irone their stories to add a twist to the plot.
meanings.sent4: The writer irones her articles to engage the readers.
meanings.sent5: Using irone in writing can make the message more impactful.
